---
layout: work
categories: work
title: spend
short_description: An experiment into typescript and angular 2 (during the alpha stage).
date: 2015-08-20 00:00:00 +0000
icon: "data:image/svg+xml;base64,"
reference_link: https://github.com/squaremelon/spend
---
spend was developed during the late stages of 2015, in an attempt to learn the brand new framework of the time: __angular2__. Not long after progress had begun, it was deemed that typescript was not the way that we wanted to go, so progress was halted on the project.

The source code is still up on [github]({{page.reference_link}}) for those who are curious.
